caption: Figure 3: Sensitivity analysis of SEMIEVOL's performance under different n and θ on variant datasets.
description: The chart displays SEMIEVOL's performance sensitivity to the number of collaborating LLMs (n) and the data selection ratio (θ).

caption: Figure 4: Entropy distribution indicates SEMIEVOL can enhanced response confidence. Lower entropy values indicate more confident predictions.
description: The chart displays the entropy distribution of Vanilla, SFT, and SEMIEVOL models' predictions on MMLU and MMLU-Pro datasets, illustrating SEMIEVOL's enhanced response confidence.

caption: Figure 6: Category-wise performance of SEMIEVOL.
description: The radar chart displays a category-wise comparison of the performance of Vanilla, SFT, and SEMIEVOL models on the MMLU-Pro dataset using Llama-3.1 8B.

caption: Figure 3: Sensitivity analysis of SEMIEVOL's performance under different n and θ on variant datasets.
description: The chart displays the sensitivity analysis of SEMIEVOL's performance across different values of n (number of collaborating models) and θ (data selection ratio) on MMLU and MMLU-Pro datasets.

caption: Figure 7: Iterative evolution performance, each iteration means perform a round of SEMIEVOL.
description: The chart displays the iterative evolution performance of the SEMIEVOL model on MMLU and MMLU-Pro datasets across four iterations.
